item.description:
Many of our meetup members will be going to the Common Ground Country Fair in Unity Maine later this month.  Please consider using the comments area of this page to indicate when you might be going and if you'd like to carpool from your location.  Based on that you can send messages to each other to organize details and trade mobile phone numbers.

 

Portland-area folks are encouraged to use the Park-and-Ride locations, though other folks may certainly find other meeting points from their parts of the state!

Here is a link to the online scheduling tool for the Fair in case you want to plan your time around sessions and other happenings.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Carpool to the Common Ground Country Fair
